comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Odd that HMS Trafalgar would be in Bain's 1914 photostream considering she was retired and sold off by the Royal Navy (RN) in March 1911.  Perhaps used as a generic warship photo to represent the Royal Navy as the Great War was about to commence?

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: another ship with side by side funnels,  Indeed it's an odd addition as she was already in reserve in 1907.
